entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
